name: Patryk Zaslawski
profile_summary: As a dedicated Senior Software Engineer with 8+ years in software development, I possess extensive expertise in delivering high-quality, efficient solutions using **.NET**, **C#**, **Java**, and **JavaScript** within diverse sectors. I have a strong understanding of **3-tier web architecture** and am adept at working with databases like **Oracle** and **MS SQL** to optimize data management. My experience is complemented by proficiency in **Azure DevOps**, **JIRA**, and version control systems such as **GIT** and **SVN**, contributing to smooth agile project management. I excel in problem-solving and communication, enabling me to effectively collaborate with cross-functional teams and stakeholders. My proficiency in software development practices ensures delivery of scalable and reliable systems aligned with modern agile methodologies.

experience.responsibilities:
- Demonstrated expertise in **.NET** and **C#** for developing scalable, high-performance applications in a 3-tier web architecture, ensuring robust integration with healthcare data systems.
- Utilized **JavaScript** frameworks to enhance user experience and interactivity in web applications, ensuring seamless communication with backend services.
- Leveraged **Oracle** and **MS SQL** databases for efficient data storage, retrieval, and management, optimizing performance through indexing and query optimization.
- Managed project workflows using **JIRA** and **Azure DevOps**, facilitating agile project methods for timely delivery of software solutions.
- Collaborated with cross-functional teams to address complex problem-solving scenarios, ensuring the alignment of technical strategies with business objectives.
- Championed communication among team members and stakeholders, fostering a collaborative environment focused on delivering innovative software solutions.
- Led the development of secure, scalable microservices, integrated with cloud solutions on **Azure**, enhancing data exchange and real-time processing capabilities.
- Implemented versioning and optimization practices, ensuring maintainability and performance of legacy and new systems.
- Conducted code reviews and provided mentorship to junior engineers, promoting best practices in **C#**, **JavaScript**, and agile software development methodologies.
- Ensured compliance with industry standards for data protection and software security, aligning with organizational policies and regulations.

Implemented and managed CI/CD pipelines using **Azure DevOps** and **GitHub Actions** to ensure continuous delivery and automated quality assurance for software releases.
Utilized **JIRA** for agile project management, enhancing team collaboration and transparency in project tracking and reporting.
Developed robust backend systems utilizing **.NET** framework and **C#** for enterprise-level applications, significantly improving performance and maintainability.
Applied advanced problem-solving techniques to troubleshoot and optimize applications, resulting in a **30%** reduction in system downtime.
Designed and integrated scalable solutions within the **3-tier web architecture**, improving user experience and system resilience.
Collaborated effectively with cross-functional teams, showcasing strong communication skills to deliver project objectives on time.
Contributed to the transition of legacy applications into modern microservices, ensuring compatibility with **Azure** cloud services and improving overall system architecture.
Leveraged **SVN** and **GIT** for version control to maintain code integrity and streamline collaborative workflows within the development team.
Participated in daily stand-ups and sprint reviews as part of the agile methodology, fostering a culture of continuous improvement.
Engaged in regular code reviews to uphold coding standards and enhance team knowledge sharing, leading to heightened code quality across the board.

- Developed and maintained high-performance backend services using **C#** and **.NET** frameworks, focusing on enhancing logic flow and database interactions within a **3-tier web architecture**.
- Utilized **Oracle** and **MS SQL** databases to architect and manage relational databases effectively, ensuring solution scalability and data integrity, contributing to a **40% reduction** in data retrieval times.
- Collaborated on projects using **JavaScript** and **Agile project methods**, improving team effectiveness and delivering features on time, achieving a sprint completion rate of **95%**.
- Engaged in effective **communication** with cross-functional teams to gather requirements and design solutions, resulting in a **30% decrease** in project misunderstandings.
- Implemented version control using **GIT** and project tracking in **JIRA** to enhance team collaboration and transparency in code changes and project status updates.
- Streamlined deployment processes using **Azure DevOps** for CI/CD, leading to quicker feature releases and consistent delivery of high-quality software.
- Resolved critical issues within legacy systems by applying strong **problem-solving** skills, significantly enhancing the overall performance and user experience.
- Designed user-centric applications leveraging modern frameworks, ensuring compatibility across multiple devices and enhancing customer satisfaction metrics by **25%**.
- Participated in team retrospectives and contributed to process improvements, fostering a culture of continuous improvement and technical excellence within the software development lifecycle.

skills:
